remarks: Cyclically shifting a word two times is commutative.  (Contributed by AV, 21-Apr-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 5-Jun-2018.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro/AV, 1-Nov-2018.)
statement: 2cshwcom $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) cyclShift M ) = ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift N ) ) $.
